articles.title: Tesla delays reveal of production Roadster 2 to April Fools’ Day
articles.description: Musk said he picked the date so he "could say I was just kidding" if it changes again. He had spent months teasing a reveal by the end of this year.
articles.author: Sean O'Kane

articles.title: Chris Sacca’s VC firm is raising a second nuclear fusion fund
articles.description: With fusion advances showing real promise, Lowercarbon Capital plans to double down.
articles.author: Julie Bort

articles.title: Tesla to begin Cybercab production in April, Musk claims
articles.description: Elon Musk said he expects Tesla to be able to put all the Cybercabs it builds on the road, and thanked Waymo for "paving the path."
articles.author: Kirsten Korosec

articles.title: Accel backs Uber rival Rapido as Prosus boosts stake
articles.description: TVS Motor booked a 152% return as it sold its Rapido stake to Accel and Prosus. Founded in 2015, Rapido has grown into a major player in India's
articles.author: Jagmeet Singh

articles.title: Grand Theft Auto VI is delayed — again
articles.description: Perhaps one of the most anticipated video games of all time, GTA VI is now slated for a November 19, 2026, release.
articles.author: Amanda Silberling

articles.title: Tesla shareholders approve Elon Musk’s $1T pay package
articles.description: The proposal received more than 75% approval. Musk can earn the $1 trillion in shares over the next 10 years if Tesla hits a number of milestones.
articles.author: Sean O'Kane

articles.title: Laude Institute announces first batch of ‘Slingshots’ AI grants
articles.description: Slingshots AI grants provide resources that would be unavailable in most academic settings. Its debut program has 15 startups focused on AI
articles.author: Russell Brandom

articles.title: Meta estimates that it earns 10% of its revenue from scams, report says
articles.description: These fraudulent ads purport to offer a product or service that isn't actually real, and may be intended to solicit payments from less savvy users.
articles.author: Amanda Silberling

articles.title: Sam Altman says OpenAI has $20B ARR and about $1.4 trillion in data center commitments
articles.description: Altman named a long list of upcoming business he thinks will generate significant revenue.
articles.author: Julie Bort

articles.title: Google to buy carbon credits from massive Amazonian reforestation project
articles.description: The deal is the first selected by the Symbiosis Coalition, an advance market commitment founded to seed the market for nature-based carbon removal.
articles.author: Tim De Chant

articles.title: Amazon launches an AI-powered Kindle Translate service for e-book authors
articles.description: Kindle Translate, an AI-powered translation service, is designed to broaden the reach of e-book authors.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: Sam Altman says he doesn’t want the government to bail out OpenAI if it fails
articles.description: The furor over Sarah Friar's comments grew so loud that Trump's AI czar David Sacks weighed in.
articles.author: Julie Bort

articles.title: Ford execs reportedly discuss ending the F-150 Lightning
articles.description: Production was already paused as Ford prioritizes gas and hybrid versions of the truck. The Lightning has been on the market for three years.
articles.author: Sean O'Kane

articles.title: Sora for Android saw nearly half a million installs on its first day
articles.description: This makes the Android launch more than 4x the size of the iOS launch, with 327% more installs (360,000) — but the firm notes that's not an
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: SpaceX’s Starlink secures more spectrum and airlines as it passes 8 million customers
articles.description: The internet provider has bought more 'direct to cell' spectrum licenses from EchoStar and struck a deal with the owner of British Airways.
articles.author: Sean O'Kane

articles.title: Meta brings its short-form video feed of AI slop to Europe
articles.description: Meta says that since the launch of Vibes, media generation in the Meta AI app has jumped more than tenfold.
articles.author: Aisha Malik

articles.title: Subtle Computing’s voice isolation models help computers understand you in noisy environments
articles.description: Subtle Computing has raised $6 million in seed funding to build voice-isolation models. The startup plans to announce a hardware device next year.
articles.author: Ivan Mehta

articles.title: Italian political consultant says he was targeted with Paragon spyware
articles.description: WhatsApp notified the consultant, who works for left-wing politicians, that his phone was targeted with spyware made by Paragon.
articles.author: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai

articles.title: Mastodon’s latest software update brings quote posts to all server operators
articles.description: Mastodon's latest software version brings quote posts with added controls to all servers.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: Peloton recalls 833,000 bikes after reports of injuries
articles.description: The Consumer Product Safety Commission is warning Peloton users to stop using the affected bikes immediately.
articles.author: Aisha Malik

articles.title: Discord’s Family Center update now lets parents monitor weekly purchases
articles.description: Discord has rolled out updates to its Family Center, giving guardians more insights into their teens' usage patterns, including purchases, top
articles.author: Ivan Mehta
